entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to zero in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
